item: We collaborate with people who believes in our vision and with a strong humanitarian will to save our children, youth and improve communities and health.
We accept donations from private, public and non-profits around the world to provide awareness, education programs and research for cancer advancement.

We also offer Outreach scholarship program that helps put a post-secondary undergraduate education within reach for disadvantaged students studying in the STEM field, Cutting edge technology, and Compliance & Regulatory programs.
Separately, we support communities mainly children holiday events, youth by offering employment, leadership skills and mentorship programs.
